short_summary: Supply of High-volume production scanners to Matane, QC and Winnipeg, MB.
description: This contract (Notice of Standing Offer) is for the supply of scanners to the Department of Public Works and Government Services.
full_summary:
========================================================
### **Tender Announcement for High-volume Production Scanners**

#### **Title**
EN929-220411-B High-volume production scanners
EN929-220411-B Numériseurs de production à grand volume

#### **Reference Number**
WS3325484802-Doc3664933481

#### **Amendment Number**
4

#### **Publication Date**
2022-09-13

#### **Tender Closing Date**
2022-11-10T14:00:00

#### **Amendment Date**
2022-10-24

#### **Contract Details**

*   **Contract Type**: Standing Offer
*   **Contract Term**: Three years (with options for two one-year extensions)
*   **Expected Start Date**: 2022-03-01
*   **Expected End Date**: 2025-03-21

#### **Procurement Details**

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### **Contact Information**

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Person**: Thomas Leboeuf (SPAC/PSPC) (il-lui / he-him)
*   **Contact Email**: thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Contact Phone**: None
*   **Contact Fax**: None

#### **Additional Information**

*   **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14092357?extsite=MTQwOTIzNTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
*   **Attachment**: None
*   **Tender Description**: PSPC requires the supply of high-volume production
